heading1: New York in 5 Days Guided Sightseeing Bus Tour
shortDescription1: With so many attractions and experiences to choose from, trips to New York fly by all too soon. Our sample five-day itinerary of New York gives you a taster of what the city has to offer and just how much you could save using The New York Pass. Oh, and there's no need to pick your attractions before you purchase - you have the flexibility to choose where to go on the day! The is what a 5 day New York Pass itinerary could look like.
shortDescription2: Expert Local Tour Guide Narrative,Transportation With Luxury Tour Bus, Bottled Water on Buses,The Staten Island Ferry,Gratuities,Hotel pickup and drop-off,Lunch,Optional upgrade to a glass-top/open-top convertible bus
shortDescription3: One World Trade Center is the seventh tallest building in the world and the tallest building in the western hemisphere. This skyscraper stands next to the footprints of the original World Trade Center buildings that were destroyed in the 9/11 terrorist attacks.One World Trade Center, is a great place to take in your first view of New York City. From here, you have awesome views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, Brooklyn, Staten Island, and New Jersey. Plus, by being here early in the day, you get to beat the crowds and have a more pleasant experience.
shortDescription4: Start the day by visiting the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island. Learn about the city's immigrant history and the significance of these iconic landmarks.Continue to the 9/11 Memorial & Museum to pay respects and gain insight into the tragic events of September 11, 2001.Explore the bustling Financial District and Wall Street, the heart of the city's financial hub.
description1: Art Museums, Central Park, Rockefeller Center, Times Square
description2: One World Trade Center, the 9/11 Memorial, Staten Island Ferry, and SoHo
description3: Art Museums, Central Park, Rockefeller Center, Times Square

shortDescription1: Welcome to the Mt. Fuji, Hakone, Lake Ashi Cruise 1 Day Bus Trip! This exciting tour will take you on a memorable journey through the stunning landscapes of Mt. Fuji, the picturesque town of Hakone, and a relaxing cruise on Lake Ashi. Here's the itinerary for your delightful one-day adventure
shortDescription2: Learn more about this activity’s Enhanced Health & Hygiene Measures,Tour the city with a licensed NYC tour guide, who will provide you with fascinating ,local information and insight,Ride in comfort in a climate-controlled, luxury tour bus,Enjoy 15-minute guided,walking tours of NYC's most iconic sites - Central Park Rockefeller Center, and more!,From April through December, take a seasonal boat cruise for breathtaking views of NYC skyline from water
shortDescription3: Specialized bilingual guide,Private Transport,Entrance fees (Cable and car and Moon Valley),Box lunch water, banana apple and chocolate
